sub_title: Programme Coordinator at Dutch Research Council
summary:
Policy officer / expedition guide / creative geek

The world around us, that's what fascinated me when I chose Geography and Planning as my bachelor's and master's. Nature versus (or with/in/over/under) built-up areas, mobility and transit,- you name it.

A magnetic attraction to the North. The wild and cold Arctic works mesmerising to me. Fresh snow under my boots, binos around my neck, some fulmar or stray gannet, and hopefully good company to explore with!

[{'company': {'id': 21237, 'name': 'NWO (Dutch Research Council)', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQF_StzeGrSPTQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1559545753836?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=9iZRqCCn3d91qqEmmBgbtPUKy5cARTzik-_jlaUJk_g', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/nwo/', 'employees': {'start': 501, 'end': 1000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'The Hague Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'NWO (Dutch Research Council)', 'description': 'Netherlands Polar Programme & German-Dutch Wadden Sea programme

The Netherlands Polar Programme manages and finances Arctic and Antarctic research and coordinates supporting activities (logistics, partnerships, memberships). The NPP is responsible for the Dutch research facility in Rothera, Antarctica and Dutch representation in SCAR, IASC, COMNAP, FARO and (indirectly) the Arctic Council working groups. My current portfolio includes:

> Antarctic tourism research programme (NWA PT-REPAIR)
> Annual Polar Symposium
> Everyday management
> Supporting the Programme Committee
> Scientific Expedition Edgeøya Svalbard 2022 
> Overviews of polar research and governance

Honorary mentions:
> Roundtable discussion at the Royal Visit Netherlands-Norway, Oslo 2021.
> Arctic Emerging Leaders Programme 2020
> Gratification for crisis management on the eve of the SEES expedition

Past deliverables:
> Strategy development PolePosition-NL 3.0 
> Matchmaking event.
> Polar Symposium 2019
> Self-evaluation report 2016-2020
> Evaluation committee assistance
> Arctic Science Ministerial documentation

NWA Dutch-German Wadden Sea research programme (2023)
Development of a new bilateral research programme for Dutch-German research on ecological effects in the Wadden Sea. Funding from 3 Dutch ministries, 3 provinces, Dutch Research Council as well as two German federal ministries.', 'title': 'Programme coordinator', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 555593, 'name': 'Oceanwide Expeditions', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQFUgjfN-BMwBg/company-logo_400_400/0/1519906294562?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=ZGwOleT5G1pl_6uyE5C2Tpm0Pt2z9ymnyjd83oVbGWE', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/oceanwide-expeditions/', 'employees': {'start': 11, 'end': 50}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Svalbard and Greenland', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Oceanwide Expeditions', 'description': 'Expedition guide for Oceanwide Expeditions on the vessels Hondius and Ortelius, in the Iceland-Greenland-Svalbard (Spitsbergen) area.

During my traineeship, I worked on four cruises in the Svalbard archipelago as member of the expedition team. This team forms the connection between the passenger and the location: We spot wildlife; we explain the guests about history, animals or climate change; we protect the passengers from wildlife coming too close (and vice versa); and we do all kinds of small jobs onboard. We also make sure that our footprint on the fragile tundra stays limited to footprints only.

Iy was a super wonderful experience and we had so much fun! I liked to be part of such a closely-knit team. I enjoyed interacting with the guests, which have so many different and interesting backgrounds. And I loved the stunning, sparkling places I was able to visit and share with others! I very much look forward to new opportunities in these cold expanses of our planet.", 'title': 'Expedition guide', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 165742, 'name': 'University of Groningen', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQHjFD1KsBlUnQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1519868080428?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=d2tRvbRlXMKelxD8kEz9CA-lmIOif13yVqBXFWP5Jc4', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/school/rijksuniversiteit-groningen/', 'employees': {'start': 5001, 'end': 10000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Groningen, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'company': 'University of Groningen', 'description': 'Deliverable for EU-PolarNET, mapping the stakeholders of polar research. EU-PolarNet is a pan-European consortium bound to (better) integrate polar research and society.', 'title': 'Stakeholder Mapper', 'employment_type': 'Contract'}]}]

[{'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'role': 'Driver', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Voedselbank Stad Groningen', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQG55o5Oo7FR7A/company-logo_400_400/0/1519887972838?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=5kzGooEkxwU-UlVgrNVJQ7zZ7mj1E2SFRwnxm2LlqA4', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/voedselbank-stad-groningen/'}, 'cause': 'ECONOMIC_EMPOWERMENT', 'description': "At the Food Bank I did our 'milk run' along supermarkets and bakeries to collect exces stocks and close-to-expire products to deliver to the needy. For me, this served both a social and environmental ideal. And it was fun, too, driving huge vans and meeting other volunteers."}, {'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'role': 'Teacher Dutch language', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'private', 'logo': None, 'url': None}, 'cause': None, 'description': "To a migrant from Mongolia who spoke neither Dutch nor English, I introduced her to the Dutch language using several books, Miffy and home-made exercises. It required a lot of creativity to invent ways to teach someone with her background 'our'​ language. How do you explain the use of 'er'​ (which has not a single English counterpart)? What do you do when the letters b and p are equal in Mongolian, so she doesn't hear the difference between bath and path? And why do the Dutch call a glove a 'hand shoe'​? And most of all: How do you encourage a thirty-year old to do her homework and start speaking Dutch...?"}, {'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'role': 'Outreach programme and newsletter, Arctic Centre IMAKA ', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'University of Groningen', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQHjFD1KsBlUnQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1519868080428?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=d2tRvbRlXMKelxD8kEz9CA-lmIOif13yVqBXFWP5Jc4', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/school/rijksuniversiteit-groningen/'}, 'cause': 'SCIENCE_AND_TECHNOLOGY', 'description': "IMAKA runs science outreach activities on behalf the Arctic Centre, University of Groningen. We organise 8 lectures about the Arctic and Antarctic each year. A researcher (sometimes also an author, artist, policymaker) is invited to share their work during a two hour evening. Often with nice photos and funny stories, but essentially a way to connect scientific results and society. Climate change is, no surprises here, the central thread. 

In January 2020 we organised a 'Public Day' for disseminating scientific results of the Svalbard expedition 2015 to the general audience. 140 people attended the symposium. 

We did a Polar Pub Quiz once and rumour has it that it was the best Polar Pub Quiz ever held in town. 

www.rug.nl/research/arctisch-centrum/outreach/imaka/
